Package utils

The utils package defines several classes to support the development process.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TypedMap.AbstractKey<K>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Constants
    Constants is a helper class which holds subclasses.
    Constants.Cards
    Holds every constant class needed for cards.
    Constants.Cards.HandValues
    This class holds the value of combinations a user could have.
    Constants.Cards.Symbols
    This Class holds every symbol a card could have.
    Constants.Cards.Value
    This Class holds every value a card could have.
    DatabaseConnection
    This class is a singleton class which perform a database connection and also can perform some operations at the database.
    Helper
    A class only with static method.
    Mailer
    A Singleton class used to send Mails.
    TypedMap
    adapted from http://stackoverflow.com/questions/10429230/map-with-multiple-value-types-with-advantages-of-generics
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TypedMap.BooleanKey  
    TypedMap.CardArrayKey  
    TypedMap.StringKey  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NotLoggedInException
    This class defines a new exception, used to check if a user is logged in.

Package utils Description

The utils package defines several classes to support the development process. It defines helper classes which was needed for the project.
Author:
Stefan Fuchs, Jan-Niklas Wortmann
